property.name: Rules
property.value: {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Jokers creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) ■ If you have a total of 4 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, this creature gets "power attacker +6000" and has "double breaker". (A creature that has "power attacker +6000 and "double breaker" gets +6000 power while attacking and breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SAVER}: Metallica (When one of your Metallica(s) would be destroyed, you may destroy this creature instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BAD ACTION DYNAMITE} 2 (You may reduce this creature's summon cost by 2. If you do, destroy this creature at the end of the turn.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Draw up to 2 cards. Then discard a card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ You may look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your hand, and the other into your shields face down. {SUPER}Each of your light cards put into your hand from your shields get "shield trigger" until the start of your next turn.
